description.displayText: I hired Avery to babysit our 8 month old daughter while we went out for the night, she was very organized and professional leading up to the job, and arrived right on time. She was accommodating to everything we asked, and was great with our dog too. She was very nice and we really enjoyed talking with her, and she was great with our daughter! If we lived in the area we would definitely hire her again, maybe on our next visit!
